sentences.english: This colonic mucosal surface is erythematous because of the enormous infestation by Trichuris organisms ( whipworms ).
sentences.chinese: 鞭虫大量侵袭使结肠粘膜表面出现红斑。

sentences.english: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) is a kind of autoimmunity disease caused by complicated factors.
sentences.chinese: 系统性红斑狼疮是一种病因复杂的自身免疫性疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pathogenesis and genetic basis of systemic lupus erythematosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨系统性红斑狼疮的发病机理和遗传基础。

sentences.english: His erythema ab igne was only on his left leg.
sentences.chinese: 他只是在左腿有热激红斑。

sentences.english: Erythema ab igne is a skin disorder in which affected skin turns brown.
sentences.chinese: 热激红斑会令皮肤变成红棕色。

sentences.english: An Ancient Storm in the Jovian Atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 大红斑是木星大气层中一个古老的风暴。

sentences.english: What calls erythema oozy sex gastritis ?
sentences.chinese: 什么叫红斑渗出性胃炎？

sentences.english: Diagnosis of reticular erythematous mucinosis was made.
In 2000 she was diagnosed with lupus erythematosus (sle).
The IR power setting can be adjusted to reduce hot spots and washouts.
sentences.chinese: IR功率设置也可调节以减少红斑和褪色。

sentences.english: A case of alopecia areata associated with vitiligo and DLE is reported.
sentences.chinese: 报告1例斑秃伴白癜风和盘状红斑狼疮。

sentences.english: The fluorescence of erythematous type and foliaceous type was most prominent in the superficial layer of epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 红斑型及落叶型的荧光以表皮浅层最为明显。

sentences.english: Discoid  lupus affects only the skin and can be identified by red marks on the face or neck.
sentences.chinese: 盘状狼疮只影响皮肤并可通过面部或颈部红斑识别。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the role of apoptotic cells in the disease development of systemic lupus erythematosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨凋亡细胞在系统性红斑狼疮发病中的作用。

sentences.english: Another form of erythema is pellagra.
sentences.chinese: 糙皮病则是另一种形式的红斑。

sentences.english: It consists of circumscribed areas of raised erythema and edema of the superficial dermis.
sentences.chinese: 它的外接领域提出了红斑和水肿的浅表真皮。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
